data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Maysan unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maysan, Iraq
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Maysan, Iraq a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 488 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Maysan do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Maysan, Iraq that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Romani, Domari people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Maysan, Iraq know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 958,370 who are far from you in Maysan, Iraq from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Maysan, Iraq be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

location.name: Maysan
location.cities_list: Al ‘Amārah, ‘Alī al Gharbī, Qal‘at Şāliḩ, Al Maymūnah, Al Kaḩlā’
